name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log.

serialNumber.title: Serial number (first five digits)
serialNumber.description: Will be used to retrieve the IP of the air-Q device by MDNS.

password.title: Password of this air-Q
password.description: Necessary to decrypt the data from air-Q.

ipAddress.title: IPv4 address (optional)
ipAddress.description: Will be used instead of MDNS detection, if given.

liveValues.title: Expose live values
liveValues.description: All sensors of air-Q will be available in HomeKit with their live values.

averages.title: Expose averaged values
averages.description: All sensors of air-Q will be available in HomeKit with their average values.
